targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DeviceBatteryLevel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> yield(name: "value")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HeartRate_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)
  |> yield(name: "HR")

from( bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RestingHR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> yield(name: "value")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Steps_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> movingAverage(n: 6)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Total Steps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2_Intraday")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Night" }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["isMainSleep"] == "True")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Levels" }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesDeep")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Deep" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesLight")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Light" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesREM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"REM" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesAwake")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Awake" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "efficiency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Efficiency" }))
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Skin Temperature Variation")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Skin Â° Variation"}))
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesDeep")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Deep" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesAwake")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Awake" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesLight")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Light" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Summary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minutesREM")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"REM" }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Sleep Levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RestingHR")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Resting HR"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HRV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: ( if r["_field"] == "dailyRmssd" then "Daily" else "Deep")}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SPO2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"SPO2"}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BreathingRate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Breathing Rate"}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Activity Records")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ActivityName"] == "Walk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "steps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Activity Records")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "steps")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field: r.ActivityName}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Activity Records")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.ActivityName}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HR zones")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Normal" or r["_field"] == "Peak" or r["_field"] == "Fat Burn" or r["_field"] == "Cardio")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r["_field"]}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Represent the level of activity in the day

targets.query:
import "date"
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Activity Minutes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "minutesFairlyActive" or r._field == "minutesLightlyActive" or r._field == "minutesSedentary" or r._field == "minutesVeryActive")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      Sedentary: r.minutesSedentary,
      Light: r.minutesLightlyActive,
      Fairly: r.minutesFairlyActive,
      Very: r.minutesVeryActive
  }))
  |> yield(name: "orderedMedian")

panels.title: Activities Minutes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Distance"}))
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "calories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"Calories"}))
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "tower")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Activity Records")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.ActivityName}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DeviceBatteryLevel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "DeviceBatteryLevel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 15m, nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> yield(name: "rateOfChange")

list.description: Determines the time zone for grouping by day
list.label: Time Zone
list.name: TimeZone
